about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Nature's Heritage Meets Luxury
about.philosophyDesc1: Amidst the hustle and bustle of modern life, Taman Wisata Bougenville exists as an exclusive escape just 2 hours from Jakarta. We believe that true luxury is not about artificial grandeur, but intimacy with nature, precious silence, and quality moments with loved ones.
about.philosophyDesc2: Every corner of Bougenville is designed to bring you closer to nature, family, and yourself. Discover authentic luxury in the midst of ancient pine forests at the foot of Mount Puntang.
about.valueHeritageDesc: Preserving the spirit of the Nagara Puntang Kingdom through architecture that respects nature and sincere Sundanese hospitality.
about.valueSustainabilityDesc: Farm-to-table concept with organic ingredients from our own garden. We are committed to eco-friendly practices.
about.valueAuthenticityDesc: A sincere experience, without pretense. From the warm welcome of our staff to the details of solid teak interiors.
about.valueCommunityDesc: Empowering the local community through hospitality training and partnerships with surrounding farmers.
about.historyDesc1: Centuries ago, the "Nagara Puntang" Kingdom stood majestically on this land. A kingdom known for its harmony with nature and wisdom in managing mountain resources.
about.historyDesc2: We keep that spirit alive through architecture that respects nature and sincere Sundanese hospitality. Each villa is designed with the philosophy of "blending with nature without changing it"—a philosophy practiced by our ancestors for hundreds of years.
about.historyDesc3: Mount Puntang is not just a place. It is a witness to history, a guardian of tradition, and home to generations who care for this ancient pine forest with all their hearts.
about.responsibilityDesc: As a resort in the heart of the mountains, we have a responsibility to protect the ecosystem that sustains this beauty. Bougenville adheres to the "leave no trace" principle and is fully committed to nature preservation.
about.ctaDesc: We invite you to be part of our story. Book your stay today.

resto.title: Resto & Function
resto.subtitle: Enjoy authentic Sundanese cuisine
resto.heroSubtitle: Bale Puntang — Where Mountain Meets Culinary Excellence
resto.story1Title: By the clear waters of Cigeureuh River
resto.story1Desc: Bale Puntang brings the warmth of classic wooden interiors with the cool nature of Mount Puntang. Choose a cozy atmosphere indoors with vintage roofing or enjoy the fresh air in the outdoor area while listening to the gurgling river.
resto.story2Title: Authentic Taste with a Modern Twist
resto.story2Desc: Every dish—from signature menus to biting spicy sambal—is made from selected local ingredients. We highlight authentic flavors with modern presentation, telling the rich Sundanese culinary tradition in every plate.
resto.story3Desc: Bale Puntang is ready to be a venue for gatherings, meetings, social gathering, or small parties with an exclusive touch. Sit back on antique wooden benches, feel the serenity of nature while chatting and creating unforgettable moments.

values.title: Fresh from the Source
values.desc: We believe that the best flavors come from nature itself. Our vegetables are harvested directly from our own gardens, and our spices are sourced from local Puntang farmers.

location.title: Find Us
location.subtitle: Your mountain sanctuary awaits amid blooming bougenville and Gunung Puntang views. Easily accessible from Bandung Airport and key stations.

info.title: Important Information
info.roadDesc: Paved road, suitable for all vehicles (Sedan, SUV, Bus Medium/Elf). Last 3km is a scenic mountain road.
info.signalDesc: Strong 4G signal for Telkomsel and XL. Complimentary Wi-Fi available in resort area.
info.parkingDesc: Spacious parking area available for cars and medium buses.
info.transportDesc: From Bandung (Leuwipanjang Terminal), take bus to Banjaran, then Angkot to Cimaung/Puntang.

steps: Exit airport south onto Jl. Husein Sastranegara towards city.
Merge onto Jl. Soekarno-Hatta south, continue to Jl. Soreang.
Pass Banjaran town, follow Jl. Gunung Puntang signs to Campaka Mulya, Cimaung.
airport.note: Estimated time: 45-60 mins | Distance: 35 km. Paved roads with curves—watch for traffic.

steps: From station, enter Tol Padaleunyi towards Cileunyi/Bandung.
Take exit to Tol Soroja (Soreang-Pasir Koja).
Exit Soreang, head towards Banjaran - Cimaung.
whoosh.note: Fastest route via toll road. Ideal for visitors from Jakarta using High Speed Train.

steps: From station, head south to Jl. Oto Iskandar Dinata.
Continue to Jl. Moh. Toha, then straight to Banjaran.
Follow signs to Gunung Puntang/Bougenville at Cimaung intersection.
station.note: Route passes through city traffic. Best to travel early morning or late afternoon.

steps: Merge onto Tol Soroja (Soreang-Pasir Koja) at Pasir Koja interchange.
Exit Soreang (end of toll), turn right to Banjaran, straight to Cimaung.
jakarta.note: Direct toll access makes the journey smooth. Exit Soreang is only 30-40 mins from resort.

steps: Head south on Jl. Moh. Toha via Dayeuhkolot area.
Continue straight until Banjaran market intersection.
Continue straight towards Pangalengan, turn left to Gunung Puntang.
city.note: Standard route. Can be busy during rush hours around Dayeuhkolot.

seo.title: Sustainability | Taman Wisata Bougenville
seo.description: Our commitment to nature conservation, community empowerment, and eco-friendly practices in Mount Puntang.
seo.keywords: eco resort bandung, sustainable tourism indonesia, nature conservation puntang

hero.label: Our Commitment
hero.title: Harmony with Nature
hero.description: We don’t just exist in nature; we are part of it. Our mission is to preserve the beauty of Mount Puntang for generations to come.

message.quote: Leave nothing but footprints, take nothing but pictures.
message.body: At Taman Wisata Bougenville, luxury and sustainability go hand in hand. We believe that true hospitality means caring for our guests and our home—the earth. From protecting the Cigeureuh river to empowering our local Sundanese community, every decision we make is rooted in respect for the environment.

conservation.title: Forest Conservation
conservation.desc: We actively protect over 5 hectares of pine forest and native vegetation, ensuring a safe habitat for local biodiversity such as the Javan Eagle.

water.title: Water Stewardship
water.desc: The Cigeureuh river is our lifeline. We implement strict strict 'no-chemical' zones near waterways and treat all wastewater biologically.

waste.title: Responsible Waste
waste.desc: We aim for zero-waste-to-landfill. Organic waste is composted for our gardens, and recyclables are processed by local partners.

community.title: Community Empowerment
community.desc: Over 80% of our staff are from local villages. We prioritize local farmers and artisans for our kitchen and decor needs.

plastic.label: Green Initiative
plastic.title: Towards Plastic-Free
plastic.description: We are phasing out single-use plastics across our resort to reduce our environmental footprint.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms and Conditions of our service

sections.title: 1. General Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using the Taman Wisata Bougenville website and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

sections.title: 2. Reservations and Payment
sections.content:
• All reservations are subject to room/villa availability.
  • A down payment may be required to secure your booking.
  • Full payment must be settled according to the instructions provided at booking confirmation.
  • Prices are subject to change without prior notice, but will not affect confirmed reservations.

sections.title: 3. Cancellation and Refunds
sections.content:
• Cancellation policies vary depending on the rate plan and promotion booked. Please refer to your booking confirmation for specific details.
  • Cancellations made within a certain period prior to arrival may incur a cancellation fee.
  • Refunds (if applicable) will be processed to the original payment method within a reasonable timeframe.

sections.title: 4. Guest Rules
sections.content:
• Guests are required to maintain order and quiet for the comfort of other guests.
  • Illegal activities, carrying illegal drugs, or dangerous weapons are strictly prohibited on resort premises.
  • Property damage caused by guests will be subject to replacement costs.
  • Check-in time is 14:00 WIB and Check-out is 12:00 WIB, unless agreed otherwise.

sections.title: 5. Liability
sections.content: Taman Wisata Bougenville is not liable for loss or damage to guest valuables not stored in safety deposit boxes (if available) or due to guest negligence. We are also not liable for injuries caused by guest negligence or violation of resort safety rules.

sections.title: 6. Governing Law
sections.content: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Indonesia. Any disputes arising shall be resolved in the jurisdiction of Indonesian courts.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Our commitment to protecting your data

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Taman Wisata Bougenville. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content:
We may collect the following information:

  • Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other identity information you provide when making a reservation or contacting us.
  • Reservation Information: Dates of stay, room preferences, and special requests.
  • Technical Information: IP address, browser type, and website usage data (cookies) to improve user experience.

use.title: 3. Use of Information
use.content:
We use your information to:

  • Process your reservations and payments.
  • Contact you regarding booking confirmations or service changes.
  • Send promotional information or newsletters (if you opted in).
  • Improve the quality of our services and website.

protection.title: 4. Data Protection
protection.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, misuse, loss, or damage.

sharing.title: 5. Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We only share information if required by law or with third-party service providers who assist our operations (e.g., payment processing), under strict confidentiality obligations.

contact.title: 6. Contact Us
contact.content:
